department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Cleaning of Commercial Kitchen Canopies and Exhaust Systems
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the supply of labour, supervision, transportation, tools, materials and equipment required for Cleaning of Commercial Kitchen Canopies and Exhaust Systems at Garrison Petawawa.
full_summary:
**Clean Kitchen Exhaust Systems**
==============================

**Reference Number**: WS3611602104-DOC3611661080
**Publication Date**: August 15, 2022

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

We are seeking proposals for the cleaning of commercial kitchen canopies and exhaust systems at Garrison Petawawa. The Department of National Defence (DND) is responsible for the procurement of labour, supervision, transportation, tools, materials, and equipment required for this project.

**Contract Details**
-------------------

*   **Contract Start Date**: January 1, 2023
*   **Contract End Date**: December 31, 2025
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Petawawa, Ontario

**Proposal Requirements**
----------------------

The proposal must meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation document. The selection criteria for this procurement are based on the lowest cost-per-point.

**Trade Agreements**
-----------------

This procurement adheres to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Contact Information**
---------------------

*   Darlene Keenan
*   darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**
-------------

The full notice can be accessed here: HTTPS://DISCOVERY.ARIBA.COM/RFX/13835799?EXTSITE=MTM4MZZ3OTLQ
